message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110? I'm willing to pay that much for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $130. Let me know if that works for you!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway! However, $130 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125? I'm really interested in the product and I think that's a fair price.

Hi Bob, I think we're getting close! I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counteroffer at $135. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to meet me here!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make another concession! However, $135 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $130. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Hi Bob, I think we've been dancing around this price for a while now. I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I'll counteroffer at $132. This is the lowest I can go, so let me know if you're willing to meet me here!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make another concession! However, $132 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $129. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Hi Bob, I think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $132. I've already made several concessions, and I need to make a profit. I'll counteroffer at $131. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to meet me here!
